content: Izrādās, ar projektu diezgan slikti: https://github.com/orgs/organicmaps/discussions/9837 .

Minēšu ka saistīts ar šo
https://openletter.earth/open-letter-to-organic-maps-shareholders-a0bf770c

https://github.com/organicmaps/organicmaps/discussions/9837 ?

Disclosure of the Metaserver CDN Source Code · organicmaps organicmaps · Discussion #9837
Today I am announcing the public disclose of the source code of so-called "metaserver", that previously was available only to few people of the team. At Organic Maps, we prioritize transparency and...
Oh wow, jau izdzēsts vai aizslepenots...

HellMap said:

https://github.com/organicmaps/organicmaps/discussions/9837 ?

Paldies, laikam noklonēts projekts vai kas taml.?

removing the MIT license while keeping his copyright

"No MIT yet, sorry."

This .. modification.. preventing any further open-source collaboration.

...that's not how it works. MIT license is not revocable.
"Future" tajā branchā gan jau.
@Rihards Olups ?

Biš typo man sanāca, bet doma - "preventing" tajā konkrētajā branchā droši vien.
Tāpēc uztaisīja pre-noņemšanas kopiju.
Ja pareizi sapratu Tavu domu.
Kopiju var taisīt protams un "atgriezt pirms problēmām". Bet oriģināls ir tik un tā MIT un paša licenzes faila izmaiņa bija licenzes pārkāpums. Jebkuras MIT koda izmaiņas paliek MIT kods.

Hmm, laikam ir trakāk nekā likās. :smiley: No sākuma padomāju, ka tikai pārcēlās uz https://git.omaps.dev/organicmaps/organicmaps

Tiesa gan, man github lapa vērās vaļā. https://github.com/organicmaps/organicmaps

organicmaps
🍃 Organic Maps is a free Android & iOS offline maps app for travelers, tourists, hikers, and cyclists. It uses crowd-sourced OpenStreetMap data and is developed with love by the community. No ads, no tracking, no data collection, no crapware. Please donate to support the development!
GitHub - organicmaps/organicmaps: This is an archive, please contribute to the main repository: https://git.omaps.dev/organicmaps/organicmaps
This is an archive, please contribute to the main repository: https://git.omaps.dev/organicmaps/organicmaps - organicmaps/organicmaps
Vakar jaunā versija iznāca, izlaida "atvērtības" komanda.

Jauna ziņa: https://git.omaps.dev/organicmaps/organicmaps/issues/10555#issuecomment-307107 .

Open Letter to Organic Maps Shareholders
https://openletter.earth/open-letter-to-organic-maps-shareholders-a0bf770c

buy out his share in Organic Maps OÜ

single mention of the Organic Maps OÜ name in the organicmaps.app website footer is enough information to convey the commercial nature of the project to the contributors

Why the f does a supposedly non-profit volunteer donation-based project have a company with shares?

"Organic Maps now is a commercial company with an open source project" and its been like that since the company's inception and from Viktor's point of view the single mention of the Organic Maps OÜ name in the organicmaps.app website footer is enough information to convey the commercial nature of the project to the contributors.

:)
That's... the same quote as above? :thinking:
That's... the same quote as above? :thinking:
Huh, did Zulip just duplicate my message? I'm too lazy to bug report tho
Huh, did Zulip just duplicate my message?

Pilnāks citāts, bet komerciāli uzņēmumi ap projektiem ir diezgan bieža parādība.
Tas, ka te ir kaut kas noklusēts un citādi izdarīts... par to arī konflikts.

Es vienīgais šādi redzu?
image.png

N.

image.png

Komerciāls uzņēmums ar open source ir normāli, jā. Bet tikai tad nevis donation bet sponsor. Un saitā parasti aprakstīti visādi subscription or support plāni. Un vienmēr repo viss precīzi aprakstīts. Bet OM man liekas vienmēr bijis ar ļoti lielu "this is community project with donations" uzsvaru. Galīgi neatbilst expectations. Nu nez. Es tik tā pamanīju lasot un tas kaut kā izcēlās.

Un tagad šis.
https://www.comaps.app/news/2025-05-12/3/

"A community-led fork of Organic Maps"
